description: Farmizen aims to address the broken food system by reconnecting consumers with the source of their food and enhancing farmer livelihoods. By promoting sustainable practices and enabling individuals to grow their own food, even in small spaces, Farmizen fosters a community-oriented approach. The initiative emphasizes transparency, traceability, and education, ensuring that both consumers and producers understand the importance of nutrition and sustainable farming. Ultimately, Farmizen seeks to create a healthier, more equitable food ecosystem for all stakeholders.
name: Farmizen
